Transportation: Her mother (Dang) requested to re-engage with our team while she was visiting here from Vietnam.

Dang had questions about whether there were any additional options for her daughter and recognizes that the location of the facility may be hard for them to get to when they are able to visit from Vietnam.
Permanency: Dang expressed that Carey has been doing well which she is comforted with but she will soon be discharged to a long term care facility.
In discussion with Dang, she shared that she has already communicated with the facility that a transfer to the Philadelphia location if a bed were to open up would be preferred for the family.
